::KitKat::

She heard a knock on the door and opened it. "yes?" She saw Drillbit 
htere and turned her back on him,"Come in if you want." She was still 
trying to fuigure out what happened to her.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> When DrillBit got no response, he figured she didn't want to talk. 
She
> seemed like the type to ball up her emotions. He WAS going to help 
her.
> He knocked again, a little louder this time.
> "KitKat, lets talk about it." He said, with his voice raised 
slightly.
